snippet.title: Skulltide Announcement Trailer - Join a Skeleton revolution! New indie games 2024!
snippet.description:
Skulltide is a 1-8 player local/online multiplayer adventure in the universe of the Planar Danse. With this announcement, it is public on Steam to wishlist, and is coming soon! If you are interested in following development, subscribe to this channel or join the Planar Danse discord community.

In Skulltide, journey into lands dying and dead to collect black magic grimoires and prolong the Skulltide, so that all skeleton-kind may evade the Grim Reaper forevermore! Grapple with magic that would kill any mortal mage (you die too, you just reanimate). Wield blades renowned through all the lands (taken from the corpses of their former wielders). 

SKULLTIDE ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2814060?utm_source=SkulltideFromYoutube&utm_medium=UTMLINKS

Join the Planar Danse discord: https://discord.gg/9FjN2PbBK6
